overview:
Mike Miklavic is the Director of Product Development and Lead Web Developer of CampusLIVE, Inc, “The College Homepage.” Prior to joining CampusLIVE.com, Mike worked with several start ups and on various web related projects. He has past experience in management as well as intricate knowledge of various web technologies and programming languages. He formerly held the position of Lead User Interface Developer on a multi-million dollar web application that is now being used by the Defense Logistics Agency.

Mike grew up in eastern Massachusetts and recently graduated from the University of Massachusetts Amherst. He holds a B.A. in Entrepreneurship and Web Development and a minor in Information Technology. He is now pursuing an M.B.A.
